_description: Used to download the runtime dependencies for running PHPActor.

runtimeDependencies.description: PHPActor - PHP Language Server and refactoring tool
runtimeDependencies.command: curl -Lo phpactor.phar https://github.com/phpactor/phpactor/releases/latest/download/phpactor.phar && mkdir -p bin && mv phpactor.phar bin/phpactor && chmod +x bin/phpactor
